alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 11:47PM EDT until March 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. The highest snow accumulations will be over the Huron Mountains and Michigamme Highlands and from Skandia to Shot Point into eastern Marquette County. Winds will gust as high as 35 mph, especially over exposed areas near Lake Superior. * WHERE...Marquette and Baraga Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
